title: SFS Alumni - IGERT Electronic Security and Privacy: Technological, Human, Enterprise, and Legal Considerations
contents: Search this site     Program Overview Sponsors FAQ People Faculty Staff Fellows Associates Alumni Research Publications Curriculum Courses Seminars Outreach International Partners Links And Resources Internships CyberCorps SFS Alumni HS-STEM Scholarships Apply           News ESP-IGERT Calendar Departments Contact Us Sitemap          CyberCorps: Scholarships for Service (SFS) Program ‎ > ‎   SFS Alumni      Michael Thompson graduated with a Bachelors of Computer Science at UIC. He i s a Cyber Security Analyst at Argonne National Laboratory. He developed an implementation of moving target defense (called MORE-MTD) while interning with the Department of Homeland Security. During his time with DHS/Argonne he has worked on moving target defense, *nix two man authentication, and automated auditing using Nessus and Splunk.
